title: What are the most educational apps that I must have on my smartphone? - Quora

response.answer_text: Smart apart It is an app which will make you smart by its curated feeds in various categories in the form of cards. The current categories on the app are: Quote: A refreshing and motivational quote by some well known and inspiring personalities. Video: Informational videos that will answer your curiosites and sometimes may amaze you. Facts: Mind boggling and informational facts that will boost your knowledge. Trending: Latest news and articles from top news providers to make you aware. On this day: What had happened on this day in the previous years. The other features of the app are: Easy Navigation: Easily navigate through different categories just by swiping up and down. Swipe left or right to navigate through the cards.Read more: Tap any card to read more about it in all the categories except videos( Tap the card to watch the video).Bookmark: Press the heart icon below any card to bookmark it and view ot later in the bookmark section.Download it on play store Smart Apart - Android Apps on Google Play
